english.segment1: Jehovah, provider. The joy of mans desire its You..always You. Keeper of history, glorious Mystery. Its You..always You.
english.segment2: Fulfillment of every longing of man. Its You - our God its You!
english.segment3: You are Able, higher is our God. Than anything that comes our way. Come what may. You alone forever stay, Youre able, higher is our God
english.segment4: Than anything that comes our way. Come what may. You alone forever stay... Abba our Father. We run to our Protector
english.segment5: You..always You. Healer of all things. We trust no other Name but You. Always You..
english.segment6: Fulfillment of every longing of man. Its You - our God its You!
english.segment7: Keeper of History, glorious Mysterey. We trust no other name. Our hope is in You. Our hope is in You
